title: DDFP 349: Draft talk and Denzel Perryman
itunes:title: DDFP 349: Draft talk and Denzel Perryman
description:
Shek is joined by Bucky Brooks and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss the NBA Playoffs (7:10) and preview next week's NFL Draft, including potential draft day surprises (21:24). Then, Denzel Perryman joins the show (47:50) to talk about prepping for the draft and his favorite Denzel Washington movie. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
